mapper.sql: id, type, is_hold, system_type, source_type, bank_code, batch_no, system_batch, batch_desc, total_trans, total_amt, status, success_trans, fail_trans, process_trans, serial_no, ret_own_spec, create_time, update_time
mapper.delete: delete from t_batch_no where status=-1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select * from ( SELECT #{param.startDate} + '~' + #{param.endDate} time, sum(t.success_trans) success_trans, (select bank_name from t_bank_code_mapp where bank_code = t.bank_code) bank_name, sum(t.success_trans) * 0.1 as feeMoney from t_batch_no t where 1 = 1
and CONVERT(varchar(100), create_time, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{param.startDate}, 23)
and CONVERT(varchar(100), create_time, 23) <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{param.endDate}, 23)
group by bank_code ) t1 where success_trans > 0
